definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
in a fit of anger (idiom); in a temper
lit. there is a knife above the character for lust/fig. lascivious activities can lead to bitter consequences
pinyin: se4 zi4 tou2 shang4 yi1 ba3 dao1

sentences.english: The woman with a large hat on her head is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 冠词，顾名思义，就是戴在名词头上的一顶帽子。

sentences.english: The strong sun shines above thee.
sentences.chinese: 耀目的太阳留在你的头上。

sentences.english: Your boss is the point where your group attaches to the tree.
sentences.chinese: 你的顶头上司就是你们组和大树的联结点。

sentences.english: The catcher was dinged on the head by a wild throw.
sentences.chinese: 那个凶猛的投球打在接手的头上。

sentences.english: Once again, the phrase “sick man of Europe” is trotted out.
sentences.chinese: 又一次，欧洲病夫的称号落到英国的头上。

sentences.english: The dreamer objected (verbally) to the interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 作梦者口头上反对这种解析。

sentences.english: Women in ancient times because of the head shaped like a bun, formerly known as bun mountain.
sentences.chinese: 因形如古代妇女头上发髻，旧称髻山。

sentences.english: The shower head drizzled water on my head.
sentences.chinese: 莲蓬头把水像下毛毛雨似的洒在我头上。

sentences.english: At last, suggestions for improving the makeup reliability of PSC connection are put forward.
sentences.chinese: 对关于提高PSC接头上扣可靠性问题提出几点建议。

sentences.english: Drape towel over head to allow steam to be inhaled.
sentences.chinese: 披覆在头上的毛巾，让蒸气被吸入。

sentences.english: She dispenses shampoo into her hands and massages it into my head.
sentences.chinese: 她将洗头液在手里按揉并涂抹到我的头上。

sentences.english: Then he climbs down from the tree, picks up a hat and puts it on.
sentences.chinese: 于是爬下树，捡起一顶帽子戴在头上。

sentences.english: But now we have to execute, not only say the words.
sentences.chinese: 但我们要付诸实施，不能停留在口头上。

sentences.english: This grass is very dark to be from the white heads of old mothers.
sentences.chinese: 这些草叶那么黑，不会是源于老妈妈头上的白发。

sentences.english: Draw some trees and stars on the paper first.
sentences.chinese: 我们首先在纸头上画些树和星星。

sentences.english: My father-in-law has ear hair like a wolverine.
sentences.chinese: 我的岳父头上留着一些像狼豹那样的耳毛。

definition: apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
pigtail/(fig.) a shortcoming or evidence of wrongdoing that can be seized upon by others
the back of the head/(fig.) the back of one's mind
